messages.title: YOUR GREEN PARTY CANDIDATE
messages.content: Camden is a special place. It's a community with a sense of its own identity, deeply concerned about justice and fairness, full of people who think we need real change in Britain – towards a society that works for the common good, not just for the few.

messages.title: YOUR GREEN PARTY LEADER
messages.content: Natalie Bennett is the leader of the Green Party. She's standing up against the damaging immigration rhetoric of UKIP, she's fighting to see every worker gets a living wage and she's determined to keep the profit motive out of the NHS.

The Green Party offers you a Britain of hope, not fear. On Thursday 7 May, you'll have the opportunity to deliver real change in Britain. Together we can make history by electing London's first Green MP.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Natalie seeks to ensure that the economy works for the common good, and stands against corporate interests that have dominated politics.

mentions.tacticalSituation: With Frank Dobson standing down as MP there are only Green and Labour councillors in the constituency.

issues.economy: Natalie stands against big business or corporate interests.
issues.health: Natalie is determined to keep the profit motive out of the NHS.
issues.immigration: She's standing up against the damaging immigration rhetoric of UKIP.

leaflet.personalStatement: Natalie Bennett offers a Britain of hope, not fear, and the opportunity to deliver real change in Britain.

images.caption: Natalie Bennett pictured on the campaign.

leaflet.additionalNotes: This publication has not been paid for by big business or corporate interests, but has been supported and funded by ordinary people.
